title: Review: KOM Indoor Trainer Rocker Plate RPV1 is a turnkey entry into better training
content:
Indoor training has been forever changed. Smart trainers have made indoor riding far more engaging and have ushered in a whole new category of riding. Once you’re hooked on a smart trainer, you start looking for other ways to make indoor riding more enjoyable and, dare I say, more realistic. If you’re going to go […]

The post Review: KOM Indoor Trainer Rocker Plate RPV1 is a turnkey entry into better training appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
